channel.title: Music – Sowelu
channel.description: Recent content in Sowelu on Music

item.title: Sowelu - MOON ON THE WATER ("BECK"ED)
item.description:
Full moon sways

Gently in the night

Of one fine day

On my way

Looking for a moment

with my dear

Full moon waves

Slowly on the surface

Of the lake

You were there

Smiling in my arms

for all those years

What a fool

I don’t know

‘Bout tomorrow

What it’s like to be

Ah

I was fool

Couldn’t let

myself to go

Even though I feel

The end

Old love affair

Floating like a bird

Resting her wings

You were there

Smiling in my arms

for all those years

What a fool

I don’t know

‘Bout tomorrow

What it’s like to be

Ah

I was fool

Couldn’t let

myself to go

Even though I feel

The end

Full moon sways

Gently in the night

Of one fine day

You were there

Smiling in my arms

for all those years

item.title: Sowelu - I Will ("鋼の錬金術師"ED)
item.description:
